title: GetDateTime (Function)
text:
FUNCTION GetDateTime : ULINT
Related to UTC this function returns the current date and time in milliseconds since Thursday, 1.1.1970 00:00:00.000, managed in a 64 Bit data type
The default
IDateTimeProvider
implementation (
DateTimeProvider
) is in use

rows.Name: GetDateTime
rows.Comment:
The current UTC date and time in milliseconds since 1.1.1970
00:00:00.000
